name: Masters of Cards
description:
Let’s join the best Playing Card community in the world to play, Poker, Solitaire, Blackjack, Spade, Gin Rummy, Bid Whist, Freecell, Hearts, Bluff, Canasta, Spider Solitaire, Crazy 8 and more…

Are you ready to have a great playing experience with millions of masters.

One app for all Card Games, Poker, Solitaire, Blackjack, Spade, Gin Rummy, Bid Whist, Freecell, Hearts, Bluff, Canasta, Spider Solitaire, Crazy 8 and more.

Play your favorite card game, seamlessly across all web and mobile versions anywhere.

==MASTERS OF CARDS FEATURES==

● BECOME A MASTER
You can become master of the day, week and month by playing your favourite game.

● WIN SURPRISE PRIZES
We have beautiful prizes for masters, collect gems and join auctions.

● GET NEW DECKS
Do not forget to check our new decks, we add new decks every month.

● GREAT SOCIAL EXPERIENCE
Meet new people from all over the world

● FREE CHIPS
Get thousands of free chips every 15 minutes.

● GUEST MODE
Play all card games without log in when ever you want

● ALL MASTERS ARE HERE
Poker Masters
Solitaire Masters
Spade Masters
Blackjack Masters
Gin Rummy Masters
Bid Whist Masters
Freecell Masters
Hearts Masters
Canasta Masters
Bluff Masters
Crayz 8 Masters

Make sure you have a good internet connection to get the best experience.

The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency.
